name: Jolt Project
description:
Jolt Project:

The army now has a new robotics project, jolt.
It's up to you to control it and ensure the success of the missions!
There are 9 stages of taking the breath away with the right difficulty and good gameplay.
Plus an insane way of survival!
Fire missiles at cars, tanks, helicopters and turrets!
The fun is guaranteed!
Use your mouse to aim and shoot and take out the enemies!
In this game you will have to be aware of the various enemies who will do everything to destroy your charges and prevent the success of your mission!
Cartoon-style graphics are optimized and fun and generate an excellent gaming environment!
